#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char inp[100005];
int m,a_count[100005];
int main()
{
	// freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s", inp+1);
		scanf("%d", &m);
		a_count[0]=0;
		int sz=0,ans=10000000;
		for (int i = 1; inp[i] != '\0'; ++i, ++sz)
		{
			if(inp[i] == 'A')
				a_count[i]=a_count[i-1]+1;
			else
				a_count[i]=a_count[i-1];
		}
		for (int i = 1; i+m-1 <= sz; ++i)
		{
			ans=min(ans,m-(a_count[i+m-1]-a_count[i-1]));
		}
		printf("%d\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
